metadata.title: Ensure NGINX is installed
metadata.description: Ensure NGINX is installed

metadata.title: Ensure the autoindex module is disabled
metadata.description: Ensure the autoindex module is disabled

metadata.title: Ensure the autoindex module is disabled
metadata.description: Ensure the autoindex module is disabled

metadata.title: Ensure access to NGINX directories and files is restricted
metadata.description: Ensure access to NGINX directories and files is restricted

metadata.title: Ensure requests for unknown host names are rejected
metadata.description: Ensure requests for unknown host names are rejected

metadata.title: Ensure keepalive_timeout is 10 seconds or less, but not 0
metadata.description: Ensure keepalive_timeout is 10 seconds or less, but not 0

metadata.title: Ensure send_timeout is set to 10 seconds or less, but not 0
metadata.description: Ensure send_timeout is set to 10 seconds or less, but not 0

metadata.title: Ensure access logging is enabled
metadata.description: Ensure access logging is enabled

metadata.title: Ensure error logging is enabled and set to the info logging level
metadata.description: Ensure error logging is enabled and set to the info logging level

metadata.title: Ensure private key permissions are restricted
metadata.description: Ensure private key permissions are restricted

metadata.title: Ensure only modern TLS protocols are used
metadata.description: Ensure only modern TLS protocols are used

metadata.title: Ensure only modern TLS protocols are used
metadata.description: Ensure only modern TLS protocols are used

metadata.title: Ensure custom Diffie-Hellman parameters are used
metadata.description: Ensure custom Diffie-Hellman parameters are used

metadata.title: Ensure Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) stapling is enabled
metadata.description: Ensure Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) stapling is enabled

metadata.title: Ensure Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) stapling is enabled
metadata.description: Ensure Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) stapling is enabled

metadata.title: Ensure HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) is enabled
metadata.description: Ensure HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) is enabled

metadata.title: Ensure upstream server traffic is authenticated with a client certificate
metadata.description: Ensure upstream server traffic is authenticated with a client certificate

metadata.title: Ensure upstream server traffic is authenticated with a client certificate
metadata.description: Ensure upstream server traffic is authenticated with a client certificate

metadata.title: Ensure the upstream traffic server certificate is trusted
metadata.description: Ensure the upstream traffic server certificate is trusted

metadata.title: Ensure the upstream traffic server certificate is trusted
metadata.description: Ensure the upstream traffic server certificate is trusted

metadata.title: Ensure session resumption is disabled to enable perfect forward security
metadata.description: Ensure session resumption is disabled to enable perfect forward security

metadata.title: Ensure HTTP/2.0 is used
metadata.description: Ensure HTTP/2.0 is used

metadata.title: Ensure timeout values for reading the client header and body are set correctly
metadata.description: Ensure timeout values for reading the client header and body are set correctly

metadata.title: Ensure timeout values for reading the client header and body are set correctly
metadata.description: Ensure timeout values for reading the client header and body are set correctly

metadata.title: Ensure the maximum request body size is set correctly
metadata.description: Ensure the maximum request body size is set correctly

metadata.title: Ensure the maximum buffer size for URIs is defined
metadata.description: Ensure the maximum buffer size for URIs is defined

metadata.title: Ensure X-Frame-Options header is configured and enabled
metadata.description: Ensure X-Frame-Options header is configured and enabled

metadata.title: Ensure X-Content-Type-Options header is configured and enabled
metadata.description: Ensure X-Content-Type-Options header is configured and enabled

metadata.title: Ensure the NGINX service account has an invalid shell
metadata.description: Ensure the NGINX service account has an invalid shell

metadata.title: Ensure the NGINX service account has an invalid shell
metadata.description: Ensure the NGINX service account has an invalid shell

metadata.title: Ensure NGINX directories and files are owned by root
metadata.description: Ensure NGINX directories and files are owned by root

metadata.title: Ensure access to NGINX directories and files is restricted
metadata.description: Ensure access to NGINX directories and files is restricted

metadata.title: Ensure the NGINX process ID (PID) file is secured
metadata.description: Ensure the NGINX process ID (PID) file is secured

metadata.title: Ensure server_tokens directive is set to `off`
metadata.description: Ensure server_tokens directive is set to `off`

metadata.title: Ensure default error and index.html pages do not reference NGINX
metadata.description: Ensure default error and index.html pages do not reference NGINX

metadata.title: Ensure default error and index.html pages do not reference NGINX
metadata.description: Ensure default error and index.html pages do not reference NGINX

metadata.title: Ensure the NGINX reverse proxy does not enable information disclosure
metadata.description: Ensure the NGINX reverse proxy does not enable information disclosure

metadata.title: Ensure the NGINX reverse proxy does not enable information disclosure
metadata.description: Ensure the NGINX reverse proxy does not enable information disclosure

metadata.title: Ensure log files are rotated
metadata.description: Ensure log files are rotated

metadata.title: Ensure log files are rotated
metadata.description: Ensure log files are rotated

metadata.title: Ensure a trusted certificate and trust chain is installed
metadata.description: Ensure a trusted certificate and trust chain is installed

rpminfo_test.comment: Ensure package name equals 'nginx' is installed

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*autoindex\h+off\h*;.*$
Ensure no file(s) named .+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*autoindex\+on;.*$

file_test.comment: Ensure any file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and does not have permissions --x--xrwx

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*server\s+\{\s*return\h+4\d{2}\h*;.*\s*\}.*$
Ensure any file(s) named ^(?i)\S+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\s*keepalive_timeout\s+(10|[1-9])\;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^(?i)\S+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx exists and matches pattern (?I)^\h*send_timeout\h+(10|[1-9])\;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx exists and does not match pattern (?i)^\h*access_log\\b
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*error_log\h+\/([^#\n\r]+\h+)+info\b(\h*#.*)?$

file_test.comment: Ensure any file(s) named ^.+\.key$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and is owned by group 0 and does not have permissions -wxrwxrwx

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*(ssl_protocols|proxy_ssl_protocols)\h+([^#\n\r;]+\h+)?(TLSv1\.[23])\b.*$
Ensure no file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*(ssl_protocols|proxy_ssl_protocols)\h+([^#\n\r;]+\h+)?(SSLv2|SSLv3|TLSv1\.[01])\b.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*ssl_dhparam\h+\/\H+\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*ssl_stapling\h+on\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*ssl_stapling_verify\h+on\h*;.*$

Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*add_header\h+Strict-Transport-Security\h+[\"']?max-age\h*=\h*([1-9][0-9]{8,}|[1-9][5-6][7-9][6-9][8-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]|[2-9][0-9]{7,}|[1-9][6-9][0-9]{6,}|[1-9][5-
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*proxy_ssl_certificate\h+\/\H+\.pem\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*proxy_ssl_certificate_key\h+\/\H+\.key\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*proxy_ssl_trusted_certificate\h+\/\H+\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*proxy_ssl_verify\h+on\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*ssl_session_tickets\h+off\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*server\s*\{\s*([\s\S]+)?\blisten\h+\d{1,5}\h+ssl\h+http2\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*client_body_timeout\h+(10|[1-9])\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*client_header_timeout\h+(10|[1-9])\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*client_max_body_size\h+(100|[1-9][0-9]|[1-9])k\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*large_client_header_buffers\h+([1-9]|[1-9][0-9]{1,2})\h+([1-9]|[1-9][0-9]{1,2})k\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*add_header\h+X-Frame-Options\h+[\'\"]SAMEORIGIN[\'\"]\h+always\h*;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*add_header\h+X-Content-Type-Options\h+(\"|\')nosniff(\"|\')(\h+[^#\n\r]+\h*)?;.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/passwd exists and matches pattern ^.*nginx\:(\/sbin\/nologin|\/bin\/false)$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/passwd exists and does not match pattern ^nginx\:.*$

file_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/ exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions ----w--w-
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/ exists and does not have permissions ----w--w-
Ensure at least one file named /var/run/nginx.pid exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*server_tokens.*off;$
Ensure no file named /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html exists and matches pattern ((?i)(\bNGINX\b))
Ensure no file named /usr/share/nginx/html/50x.html exists and matches pattern ((?i)(\bNGINX\b))
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern (?i)\h*proxy_hide_header\h+x-powered-by;[a-z\h*]*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*proxy_hide_header\h+server;[a-z\h*]*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/logrotate.d/nginx exists and matches pattern ^\h*weekly\b
Ensure at least one file named /etc/logrotate.d/nginx exists and matches pattern ^\h*rotate\s+([1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|13)\b
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*ssl_certificate_key\s+\/\S+;[a-z\s]*$

rpminfo_object.comment: Ensure package name equals 'nginx' is installed
